com.msi.moble

Class mobleSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msi.moble.mobleSettings

  • public class mobleSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to provision (configure) target device.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  mobleSettings.capabilitiesListener
      Interface for capabilities listener
      static class  mobleSettings.Identifier
      Class for identifier parameters
      static interface  mobleSettings.onCompletedListener
      Callbacks for user application.
      static interface  mobleSettings.onProvisionComplete
      Callbacks when provisioning completes
      static interface  mobleSettings.provisionerStateChanged
      Interface to listen provisioner state changed

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public boolean read(android.content.Context context,
                    java.lang.String address,
                    mobleSettings.onCompletedListener listener)
        Reads configuration of target device.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object of user application.
        address - MAC address of target device.
        listener - reference to listener object which will be called when configuration reading is completed.
        Returns:
        true if configuration reading has started, false otherwise. The following methods can be called when configuration is read: isInited(), getMobleAddress(). Callback method will be called when configuration is read.

      • provision

        public boolean provision(android.content.Context context,
                         java.lang.String address,
                         mobleAddress moble,
                         int identifyDuration,
                         mobleSettings.onProvisionComplete statusListener,
                         mobleSettings.capabilitiesListener capabilitiesLstnr,
                         mobleSettings.provisionerStateChanged psc,
                         int completionDelay,
                         CustomProvisioning cpr)
        Provision target device.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object of user application.
        address - MAC address of target device.
        moble - assigned MoBLE address
        identifyDuration - The duration of Identify state of unprovisioned node.No Unit.Deprecated.
        statusListener - provisioning status listener.
        capabilitiesLstnr - capabilities listener
        psc - provisioning states changing listener
        completionDelay - delay in completion in milliseconds (range from 0 to 5000)
        cpr - CustomProvisioning type object
        Returns:
        true if provisioning has started, false otherwise. Callback method will be called when configuration is written.

      • setLogFileName

        public void setLogFileName(java.io.File fileName)
        Sets the name of the Log File
        Parameters:
        fileName - object of type File

      • addLogl

        public void addLogl(java.lang.String text)
        Parameters:
        text -

      • writeTxPower

        public boolean writeTxPower(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            int txPower,
                            mobleSettings.onCompletedListener listener)
        Set TX power level of target device.
        Parameters:
        context - Context object of user application.
        address - MAC address of target device.
        txPower - TX power level to be assigned. The following codes are defined:
        0 - -18.0
        1 - -14.7
        2 - -11.4
        3 - -8.1
        4 - -4.9
        5 - -1.6
        6 - 1.7
        7 - 5.0
        listener - reference to listener object which will be called when writing is completed.
        Returns:
        true if writing has started, false otherwise. Callback method will be called when configuration is written.

      • isInited

        public boolean isInited()
        Checks if target device is configured (provisioned).
        Returns:
        true is device is configured and false otherwise.

      • getMobleAddress

        public mobleAddress getMobleAddress()
        Gets MoBLE address of configured device.
        Returns:
        address of configured device. If device is not configured then null is returned.

      • getTxPower

        public int getTxPower()
        Gets TX power level of configured device.
        Returns:
        code of TX power level. The following codes are defined:
        0 - -18.0
        1 - -14.7
        2 - -11.4
        3 - -8.1
        4 - -4.9
        5 - -1.6
        6 - 1.7
        7 - 5.0

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Stops provisioning.

      • getGroups

        public java.util.Collection<mobleAddress> getGroups()
        Gets collection of group addresses to which target device is subscribed.
        Returns:
        collection of group addresses.

      • addGroup

        public mobleStatus addGroup(android.content.Context context,
                            mobleAddress address,
                            mobleAddress mElementaddress,
                            mobleAddress group,
                            ConfigurationModelClient.ConfigModelSubscriptionStatusCallback listener)
        Subscribe target device to collection of groups.
        Parameters:
        context - application context.
        address - address of target device
        mElementaddress - address of target element.
        group - group address for target device to be subscribed to.
        listener - reference to listener object which will be called when subscribing is completed.
        Returns:
        true if subscribing has started, false otherwise. Callback method will be called when subscribing is completed.

      • removeGroup

        public mobleStatus removeGroup(android.content.Context context,
                               mobleAddress address,
                               mobleAddress mElementaddress,
                               mobleAddress group,
                               ConfigurationModelClient.ConfigModelSubscriptionStatusCallback listener)
        Unsubscribe target device from collection of groups.
        Parameters:
        context - application context.
        address - address of target device
        mElementaddress - address of Target element.
        group - group address for target device to be unsubscribed from.
        listener - reference to listener object which will be called when unsubscribing is completed.
        Returns:
        true if unsubscribing has started, false otherwise. Callback method will be called when unsubscribing is completed.

      • removeAllGroups

        public mobleStatus removeAllGroups(android.content.Context context,
                                   mobleAddress address,
                                   ConfigurationModelClient.ConfigModelSubscriptionStatusCallback listener)
        Unsubscribe target device from all groups.
        Parameters:
        context - application context.
        address - address of target device
        listener - reference to listener object which will be called when unsubscribing is completed.
        Returns:
        true if unsubscribing has started, false otherwise. Callback method will be called when unsubscribing is completed.

      • setPublicationAddress

        public boolean setPublicationAddress(android.content.Context context,
                                     mobleAddress nodeAddress,
                                     mobleAddress elementAddress,
                                     int publishAddress,
                                     ConfigurationModelClient.ConfigModelPublicationStatusCallback callback)
        Method to set publication adress
        Parameters:
        context - context
        nodeAddress - address of the node
        elementAddress - address of the element
        publishAddress - publish address of the node
        callback - ConfigModelPublicationStatusCallback
        Returns:
        status false if operation fails, true if operation succeeds.
